meta.description: Optimize the number of regular and premium handbags to sell to maximize monthly profit under budget and sales constraints.

sets.name: HANDBAG_TYPES
sets.description: Types of handbags sold by the company.

params.name: max_sales
params.description: Maximum number of handbags that can be sold per month.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of handbags sold of each type.

objective.name: max_monthly_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total monthly profit from selling handbags.

constraints.name: budget_constraint
constraints.description: Total manufacturing cost must not exceed the budget.

constraints.name: sales_limit_regular
constraints.description: Sales of regular handbags must not exceed the maximum sales limit.

constraints.name: sales_limit_premium
constraints.description: Sales of premium handbags must not exceed the maximum sales limit.
